abstract: Goldman Sachs said Monday that it had laid off several equity analysts as it moved to cut costs and tighten its operations. Among those let go was William Tanona, Goldman’s financial services analyst, who covered large banks like Citigroup, as well as small investment banks like Evercore.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs said Monday that it had laid off several equity analysts as it moved to cut costs and tighten its operations. Among those let go was William Tanona, Goldman’s financial services analyst, who covered large banks like Citigroup, as well as small investment banks like Evercore.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Lays Off 13 Analysts Including Tanona
